definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: In fact this retaliatory complaints, you can only appeal on it.
sentences.chinese: 實際上這種報復性投訴，你只申訴就可以了。

sentences.english: The temporary cease-fire agreement does not preclude possible retaliatory attacks later.
sentences.chinese: 臨時停火協議不能防止以後發生報復性攻擊的可能性。

sentences.english: As this plane was hit by electrical frequencies, the vibration of vindictiveness resulted.
sentences.chinese: 當此層面被電性頻率撞擊，報復性振動產生。

sentences.english: It is the vibration of vindictiveness that causes humans to torture themselves or another.
sentences.chinese: 就是報復性振動導致人類打擊自己或別人。
